description: Look good, climb good. The Dirtbag Short is stretchy, durable, and comfortable. These full stretch shorts have a vintage-inspired silhouette with front and back drop-in pockets and an elasticized waistband with drawcord to adjust fit. Available in two different fabrics: wide wale corduroy and a stretch twill, these shorts provide a comfortable feel and are also harness compatible.
name: Black Diamond Dirtbag Shorts, 7" Inseam - Mens
